thread.title: Nate

author: Nate
title: Nate
text: Ordering from Willis Orchards was a Great Experience. Excellent Customer service and faster than expected shipping and arrival of my bare root plants, when I received them they were packed extremely well and had an ample amount of hydration gel to keep the roots good and moist during shipping. I had one issue with one of my trees, as it had a questionable scar in the bark I was concerned about. I contacted them about the concern and Willis Orchards did not hesitate to send me another tree to replace it. Overall I am very pleased with the company and will not hesitate to Order from them in the future.
